title: Babad Tanah Jawi
subtitle: The Revised Prose Version
author: C.F. Winter Sr.
description: This publication presents the revised prose version of the Babad Tanah Jawi originally prepared by C.F. Winter Sr. in the nineteenth century. Intended as a model for formal Javanese prose, the text offers a Javanese perspective on Javanese history from its beginnings until 1742. Edited by Willem Remmelink, this edition includes the Javanese script text and an English translation, making an important early attempt at standardizing Javanese prose accessible to both linguists and historians.
